Title: Contrapasso
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Lisa Joy (teleplay by), Dominic Mitchell (story by), Lisa Joy (story by), Charles Yu (story editor), Halley Wegryn Gross (story editor), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: Dolores, William and Logan reach Pariah, and are recruited for a dangerous mission; The Man in Black meets an unlikely ally.
